Category.Name: References
Category.Description: Directories to use in referencing projects

StringListProperty.Name: ExecutablePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for executable files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable PATH.

StringListProperty.Name: IncludePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for include files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable INCLUDE.

StringListProperty.Name: ExternalIncludePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to treat as external/system during compilation and skip in build up-to-date check.

StringListProperty.Name: ReferencePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for metadata files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable LIBPATH.

StringListProperty.Name: LibraryPath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for library files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable LIB.

StringListProperty.Name: LibraryWPath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for winmd metadata files while building a VC++ project. Gets concatenated with 'Reference Directories' into LIBPATH.

StringListProperty.Name: SourcePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for source files to use for Intellisense.

StringListProperty.Name: ExcludePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to skip when searching for scan dependencies.

StringListProperty.Name: PublicIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: One or more directories to automatically add to the include path in the referencing projects.

BoolProperty.Name: AllProjectIncludesArePublic
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies if directories or all project header files should be automatically added to the include path in the referencing projects.

StringListProperty.Name: PublicModuleDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: One or more this project directories containing c++ module and/or header unit sources to make automatically available in the referencing projects.

BoolProperty.Name: AllProjectBMIsArePublic
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies if all project modules and header units should be automatically available in the referencing projects.
